summary: There are only a handful of children living in Bullerbyn. This film follows their story through the fall and winter, picking up at the moment "The Children of Noisy Village" finishes.
cast: Linda Bergström|Crispin Dickson Wendenius|Henrik Larsson|Ellen Demérus|Anna Sahlin|Harald Lönnbro|Tove Edfeldt|Elisabeth Nordkvist|Ingwar Svensson|Catti Edfeldt|Bill Jönsson|Ann-Sofie Knape|Sören Petersson|Sigfrid Eriksson|Louise Ræder|Peter Dywik|Olof Sjögren|Ewa Carlsson|Britta Sterneland|Bernhard Andersson|Nina Englund
keywords: screenplay adapted by author|eastern europe|year 1929|year 1928|family relationships
title: Mer om oss barn i Bullerbyn
